db:abstract.db:para: Represents information about a Vulkan layer.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QVulkanLayer::description
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the description of the layer.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QVulkanLayer::name
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the name of the layer.

db:section.db:title: QVersionNumber QVulkanLayer::specVersion
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the Vulkan version the layer was written against.

db:section.db:title: uint32_t QVulkanLayer::version
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the version of the layer. This is an integer, increasing with each backward compatible change.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] size_t qHash(const QVulkanLayer &key, size_t seed = 0)
db:section.db:para: Returns the hash value for key, using seed to seed the calculation.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] bool operator!=(const QVulkanLayer &lhs, const QVulkanLayer &rhs)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if Vulkan layers lhs and rhs have different name, version, or spec version.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] bool operator==(const QVulkanLayer &lhs, const QVulkanLayer &rhs)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if Vulkan layers lhs and rhs have the same name, version, and spec version.
